Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the visa officer reasonably refuse Grusas' work permit application based on lack of required experience?
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant lacked three years of cooking experience as required by LMO and NOC
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonable grounds to believe applicant cannot perform the work
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of refusal and procedural fairness
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of three years of cooking experience despite other qualifications
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review of visa officer's decision

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to meet work permit requirements under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Violation_Type: Non-compliance with work permit eligibility criteria
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the visa officer reasonably refuse Grusas' work permit application based on lack of required experience?
Crimes.Application_Facts: Grusas lacked three years of cooking experience as required by LMO and NOC
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Foreign national applying for work permit
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Visa officer applied regulatory standards objectively
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged unreasonableness or procedural unfairness in refusal
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Applicant's work experience relative to job requirements
Crimes.Application_Basis: Employer's Labor Market Opinion (LMO) and National Occupational Classification (NOC) standards
Crimes.Cause_Description: Applicant did not meet mandatory three-year cooking experience requirement
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Officer assessed experience against objective standards
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Experience evaluated against LMO and NOC criteria
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Reasonable grounds to believe applicant could not perform required work
